FOR CAT FRIENDS, CUDDLE CHAMPIONS AND CANNED FOOD OPENERS







Incredibly easy


CATSOMAT wet food feeder simplifies & ensures feeding while giving your cat the consistency they crave!

We enjoy our fuzzy friends, and want the best for them.
But there’s one problem many have not been able to solve: Feeding nutritious, properly cooled wet food to different cats at different times — maybe in different amounts. CATSOMAT can help you solve this problem.

As our pets age and their needs change; or if we add a second cat or more: CATSOMAT will help you care for them as much as you love them.
We know you want to provide the best possible feedings and care to your pets. We do, too. CATSOMAT is here to help.
Of course, it can't replace us. 
And it's not meant to.
But it can reliably cover for us.
when we are not at home. 


CATSOMAT: Truly unique and truly helpful



COOLED WET FOOD: CATSOMAT is the ONLY thermo-electrically cooled WET FOOD automatic feeder in the world! Unlike others that attempt to use ice packs (we think using ice packs is totally ineffective), CATSOMAT continuously cools and preserves fresh and healthy food.
MULTI-CAT HOUSEHOLDS: CATSOMAT is perfect for multi-cat households: Using RFID technology, CATSOMAT allows each cat to receive only the food intended for it. Need to prevent one cat from stealing another cat’s meal? CATSOMAT is the answer.

PROMOTE GOOD HEALTH: CATSOMAT will help keep your kitties healthy: It is ideal for safely feeding elderly cats or pets with special health needs — such as cats that need regular and reliable medication.


WEIGHT CONTROL: Ideal for diet management: If your cat is overweight and you would like to gently control intake, CATSOMAT will ensure that only the food you serve will be available when you want it to be.


NATURAL FEEDING PATTERN: Some experts believe multiple, small feedings throughout the day is a more natural and healthful feeding pattern. CATSOMAT allows you to mimic natural feeding patterns.


ALWAYS ON DUTY: CATSOMAT is on duty, ready to serve your pet 24/7.



->> back to top 



Tech for Pet: How it Works


The CATSOMAT II is unique and cannot be compared with any other cat feeder.





Current wet feeders (except for our original CATSOMAT) do not deliver constant and reliable cooling. All other feeders use ice packs to cool food, and this is only a temporary measure lasting at most 12 hours. CATSOMAT II uses thermoelectric cooling. What is that? 

THERMO-ELECTRIC COOLING: WHAT IS IT?


Thermo-electric cooling is very similar to standard refrigeration, except it does not use a compressor. Thermo-electric cooling is also known as a "Peltier" device. Peltier technology uses electricity to transfer heat from one side of a metal plate to the other side. The heat transferred is ejected (via a whisper-quiet fan), and the cooling is accomplished. It seems like magic, but it is not. It is the miracle of a solid-state refrigerator.
CATSOMAT II uses thermoelectric cooling technology to efficiently cool your pet’s food, keeping it at a safe temperature of 42.8 degrees fahrenheit. For comparison, your household refrigerator might keep food at between 42 and 47 degrees fahrenheit. Thermoelectric cooling is far more energy efficient than standard, compressor-based cooling technology.
Because CATSOMAT II has seven feeding compartments, you can easily serve dry food, too. You can choose to turn off the cooling whenever you want, or use it to serve wet food at one time, and dry food at another. All in one convenient setting.


Your cat won’t eat food that's too cold? We have you covered: CATSOMAT II 
can preheat wet food just before serving!

Since cold food sometimes can upset a cat’s stomach, we’ve created an 
integrated innovative heating function that turns on to preheat the food
 right before it is served at feeding time. You can turn the preheat 
function on or off, depending on your cat’s preference. Or, if you are 
using dry food, you can turn it off altogether.



With the CATSOMAT II, the safe and reliable feeding of several cats in a household is incredibly simplified. 



CATSOMAT identifies your pet using RFID technology:
If you have “chipped” your cat — the grain-sized 
transponder inserted into most rescue pets today — CATSOMAT II uses that to automatically recognize each cat, individually. Each feeding bowl inside the CATSOMAT 
II can be mapped to an individual pet’s transponder, and only the bowl you designate will be presented. This works for up to seven cats!








Older cats particularly require small food portions distributed throughout the day. For ill cats, regular and safe intake of their medication is crucial. In combination with our RFID technology, an intelligent locking mechanism ensures that the feeding bowls are automatically locked in and cooled after feeding. 

This way, each cat can eat what they want and then come back to the same food later. CATSOMAT II ensures that only the food — perhaps containing medications — for a particular cat is presented to that cat, and that cat only.





Why multiple small meals are ideal for cats

CATSOMAT II ensures that your cats do
 not overeat because they learn that they can eat whenever they want — 
up to the portions you allow.This is important because, unlike dogs,
 cats stomachs do not “dilate” — they do
 not expand to accept a lot of food all at once. Cats naturally prefer 
several small meals, and CATSOMAT II makes it possible. There is some 
evidence that feeding your cat in this naturally-occurring way leads to 
better health.
-> back to the top




Do you also have a hungry dog in your household that nibbles at the kitty dish? 





No problem!

CATSOMAT II not only ensures that individual cats are fed 
their designated meals, it also makes sure that Fido does not eat 
kitty’s food. None but your RFID-identified cat will be able to eat your pet’s food.
Uneaten food is returned to be properly cooled after you cat eats only a portion — automatically!One cat or many, CATSOMAT is definitely the right choice!


Extremely easy to use — while at home or away! 


The touch screen is incredibly easy to use.
You can choose to program the CATSOMAT II with the simple and intuitive 
touch screen.
Other feeders can be defeated by clever cats. Not CATSOMAT. The touch-screen interface makes sure that not even the cleverest of 
cats can modify the program.
Does your cat use a smartphone? Didn't think so. But CATSOMAT
 II does: It is the ONLY wet food feeder in the world that allows you to control 
it using a smartphone or tablet interface!
You 
can rest assured that your kitty will be served food on the schedule you set.



The WiFi-enabled CATSOMAT App
CATSOMAT II is the only cooled cat feeder in the world that can be controlled at any time and from anywhere in the world using an internet-connected desktop computer, tablet or smartphone.
The CATSOMAT II App that this campaign will help fund will allow you to control and reprogram every setting, from anywhere. This is especially useful for unexpected changes in your schedule. The only thing that must be done manually is refilling the device.






For finicky cats who insist on just the right food



Using seven 13.5 oz feeding dishes, you can present any one of them to your cat(s) at any time — from anywhere in the world (using your internet connected device and the smartphone app we will build with this campaign). The feeding tray is food-safe, acid-resistant, and dishwasher safe.
We will make several standard, pre-programmed menus (e.g., the “weekend menu”) that quickly and easily ensures your pet is lovingly cared for while you are away. Your cat will be thrilled, and you will be confident you are showing them all the love they need until you are able to return.
-> back to the top







Knowing that everything is okay.




The integrated camera allows you to look in on your pet at any time, from anywhere. You can check in to make sure they are eating the food you provided.

The CATSOMAT II, using the funding from this campaign, will have real-time video recording (and single images) to let you know that your cat is feeding properly. You will also be able to receive a text message alerting you to when your cat feeds using the smartphone app. Or you could choose to look in on and even talk to your kitty when they are feeding.







Say "Hello kitty" - even when you are not at home


Our trigger call function enables you to individually setup a trigger call for each cat through the integrated microphone that plays when it is feeding time. Cats love rituals and you will be amazed to see just how thrilled your pets will be when they hear your voice. 
And we have even gone a step further!



With the CATSOMAT II, not only can you individually call your pets during feeding sessions, you can also get to talk to them from anywhere through the integrated speaker and microphone function thanks to the WLAN connection. Through the integrated microphones, you can hear how relaxed your pets are and soothed to hear your voice.










Tamper-proof locking technology
Most cat feeders simply DO NOT secure food against clever kitties. The CATSOMAT II guarantees through its tamper-proof design that even your cleverest kitty will not get into food not actively presented. The body of the device uses a dual locking mechanism that can only be opened by human hands.
CATSOMAT II has an integrated battery backup 



BATTERY BACKUP
In the event of a power failure, the integrated battery supplies power for up to 60 hours of operation (when fully charged). Although the cooling is deactivated when on battery power, the meals will still be presented according to your programmed schedule. The CATSOMAT II is well-insulated and will keep food properly cool for the limited duration of most power failures. Once power is restored, the cooling function automatically returns and food is then maintained at the temperature you have selected. Importantly, your program is preserved, so you will not need to reenter information after a power failure.
Important (and obvious) note: If there is no power for an extended duration, owners must replace perishable wet food in the tray at the earliest opportunity to ensure the health of your cat. Cats will not eat spoiled food.



Form follows function - It works with 100% confidence and is stylish at the same time.




FORM FOLLOWS FUNCTION
In the best German way, our motto is “form follows function.” The main challenge was to be in the highest degree certain that the CATSOMAT II would work every time, all the time, exactly as you programmed it. The CATSOMAT II is made with tested, food-safe materials and safely operates so that you can be sure your pet can use this machine safely with absolute confidence.
Happily, the device turned out to be attractive thanks to its appealing and timeless design.
The first CATSOMAT IIs will be produced in an elegant shade of grey. Later, we will offer other designer colors — and perhaps even unique, one-of-a-kind colors that you choose!
If you want a particular color, then you should take a look at our "Special Color PERK"!

More benefits of the CATSOMAT II that you and your pet will love 





Flies cannot infest your pet’s food because the lid is tightly secured!


You control your schedule instead of your kitty’s tummy: It's okay if you are running late.


Your pet(s) can be safely and securely cared for in your temporary absence without burdening friends or relatives, or paying a pet sitter.


Your privacy is intact: You do not have to invite people in to your home or give them your keys to care for your pet during short vacations or outings.

On 17th June 2011 the first CATSOMAT was launched in Germany as part of “Maintier 2011” (German animal trade show) and was successfully marketed by the then newly established CATSOMAT GmbH & Co. Pet Products KG. -> back to the top 



Do you want to become an investor? 


Are you looking for a future-oriented investment and wish to use your investment towards expansion of our company? If yes, simply write us a message at rp@catsomat.com. We look forward to hearing from you. 
Are you interested in a reseller partnership? 

Are you a reseller and wish to be among the first ones who bring the CATSOMAT II to your country? The 10+1 reseller PERK secures you the exclusive ticket to our reseller partner program. You will hereby receive 10 devices + 1 for free before the official launch. Herewith, you will not just be supporting us, this will also secure you the pole position. -> back to the top 



FAQ


Q: Why is the CATSOMAT so expensive compared to other feeders?



A: For a device to operate independently and safely in your home there is a whole host of safety criteria, regulatory standards, and design specifications to be engineered.  CATSOMAT has done the engineering, regulatory compliance, and safety studies for you -- and then manufactured the device to those specifications.What else do you own to make your life easier? iPhones? Expensive kitchen appliances? How about a gorgeous flat-screen TV? All these things serve to make our lives easier and enjoyable. Catsomat will make your life easier, too -- and help keep your cat healthy!



Q: Is the CATSOMAT safe to operate when I am not home?



A: Yes. The entire purpose of the CATSOMAT is to provide hygienically-cooled wet food to your pet, safely, when you are away.



Q: How long will food stay fresh?



A: Wet food is a perishable item. The CATSOMAT will maintain food freshness for the same amount of time an opened can of food can be safely stored in a household refrigerator (6°C). In general, up to 3-5 days for canned food. Up to 3 days for pre-frozen raw pet food.



Safe food handling (for humans and pets) is something we cannot answer here. But suffice it to say that safe food handling practices should always be observed.


Q: Can I use CATSOMAT with "raw food"?



A: Yes. Please note, however, that raw food has not been pasteurized nor treated, and is thus even more perishable than canned food. CATSOMAT strongly recommends pre-freezing raw food placed in the device so that it thaws for presentation in a cooled environment. Pre-frozen raw food should never be left in the device for longer than 3 days.



Q: Is the CATSOMAT expensive to operate?



A: Not at all. It is equivalent to a 90-Watt lightbulb in power consumption. Energy consumption is a mere fraction of standard, compressor-type refrigeration.



Q: Aren't plastics harmful to use in storing food?



A: Not all plastics are the same. The plastic we use is polycarbonate, a stable form of plastic that is exceptionally durable. It is dishwasher safe, and food safe.



Q: Doesn't plastic harbor bacteria?



A: The feeding tray is scratch-resistant, food-safe polycarbonate, and thus does not develop micro-scratches that can harbor bacteria. We have studied this in real-time deployments for three years on the CATSOMAT I. The feed tray material is safe.



Q: Is the CATSOMAT II self-cleaning and self-filling?



A: No. We asked our engineers to accomplish this. Sadly, they have not. You must fill and maintain the CATSOMAT. Happily, the CATSOMAT dish can be run through an automatic dishwasher.



Q: Will the CATSOMAT II smartphone app work if I do not have internet connectivity and a WiFi-enabled router at my home?



A: Nope.



Q: Will the CATSOMAT II smartphone app alert me about any issues, such as power failures?



A: Yep.



Q: Will I be able to track whether my cat is eating?



A: Yes. We think, particularly for cats with special health concerns, this is a marvelous advance. You will be able to configure smartphone alerts that tell you your cat is feeding, and view your cat feeding via the FREE smartphone app.



Q: Will I be able to review the history of my pet's feeding habits?



A: Yes. 



Q: What about internet security protocols and privacy?



A: You are a smart consumer. Everyone should be aware of devices that connect to the internet, and whether they are deployed with encryption and security. The CATSOMAT II internet-connected functions will have encryption and security built in.



Q: I do not know if my cat has an RFID chip in place, yet. How do I tell?



A: If you adopted your cat through a rescue shelter, it is very likely that the RFID chip is in place. The surest way to find out is to take your pet to a shelter or veterinarian and determine if the RFID signal shows up on the monitors there.



Or, if you get the CATSOMAT II (and we think you should), you will be able to see the RFID unique identifier via the CATSOMAT II display and interface, if one is there.


Q: What if my cat does not have an RFID chip? Or if I do not want to insert one?



A: There are readily-available RFID  collars on the market. But we do not recommend them. 



Q: I do not want to add an RFID chip to my pet, via collar or insert. Will the device work?



A: The device can be programmed to work on an automated schedule that does not rely on RFID recognition. But using the CATSOMAT II in this way defeats many of the values and purposes of the device. We think you should reconsider.


Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask one of our project creators directly.



Ask a question now

-> back to the top


As featured in











-> back to the top

story:
UPDATE! Thanks to your help, along with help from several new corporate sponsors, we've covered the costs of the tent! That said, keep donating! All money raised at this point goes directly to Porter-Leath!

Lets get ready to STUMBLE!

When?: December 5, 2015 

Where?: Downtown Memphis

Why?: Stumbling Santa Pub Crawl of course, benefiting the children of Porter-Leath!

It feels as if the Stumbling Santa Pub Crawl has been around just as long as ol' Saint Nick himself. Stumbling Santa continues to grow just like Santa’s big belly. The normal meeting place, The Flying Saucer, cannot hold all 1200+ of us. Since December is usually a nailbitingly frigid, freezing month, we have a goal of raising $7,000 to take care of a large tent to hold everyone in hopes of keeping our spirits jolly and our bodies warm. We need you to help to keep the party going! Our winter wonderland of a heated tent will keep Jack Frost out! 

We need you to donate now and help cover the costs of the party! We'll have corporate sponsors joining us soon, but we need your help to make this party the best ever. Any money donated over and above the costs will be sent to Porter-Leath, as they often have "toy gaps" and need to do some shopping. All toys collected the night of the event will be donated to the children of Porter-Leath. Without these toys, the 5,800+ Porter-Leath Preschoolers get little to nothing for Christmas. Stumbling Santa leads into Porter-Leath's annual Toy Truck drive and gets them off to a fantastic start in making sure every child gets some holiday magic. These are all local children, so let's show them how much we care! Your donation is highly appreciated in making this holiday one that these loving children will never forget! Remember, any extra money donated will go straight to Porter-Leath!

Once you have hauled your toys to the Flying Saucer for the Porter-Leath children, the tent will be warm and cozy, awaiting you and your fellow Santas with plenty of beverages to get your stumbling experience started.

You all have provided for us year after year, filling vans upon vans with toys. Let’s keep Scrooge out of the picture and continue to do the same this year by keeping these children’s Christmas spirits alive!

Short Summary

Hi,

I believe everyone should have a throne to honor themselves, whether it be a throne of persistence, knowledge or sweetness is personal to each person:

  • My goal is to add a little sweetness into peoples lives by providing candied thrones

What We Need & What You Get

Each $800 contribution awards you a Candied Throne with 1 Inflatable Character and Speared backing (as seen in video)

Each $500 contribution awards you a Candied Throne delivered to your home (Candy Throne minus speared backing)

     Each $20 contribution awards you a box of granola or cookies with a Candy Throne sticker
    Each $5 contribution awards you one granola or pastry bar with a Candy Throne sticker

The Impact

My goal is the make the best Candy Throne or Candy House, come join me on my journey!

story:
First I'd like to thank you for taking the time to read my request for this funding. It's a beautiful thing to have your interest and concern. 

My name is Kery Anderson, I'm 52 years old and have been incarcerated in the Washington State Dept of Corrections for 34yrs, since 1981, at the age of 18yrs. 

The purpose of this crowdfund has many purposes. The first and most important, to help a person who has been in prison for 34yrs and counting (release date 29 Oct 2018) develop a solid release plan. This includes having funds available to secure a place to live upon release, purchase a vehicle, helping secure employment and the basic necessities of starting life from square one, like: smart phone, tablet/laptop, clothing, food, license, etc. Imagine this: being isolated from society for 34+yrs, since 1981! Then imagine what it would be like getting thrown into society with literally just the clothing on your back, possibly no place to live, and a $40 release check. Having to start your life from that point on is a challenging thought to say the least - no resources, no family or friends, no place to live, no job, a scary position to be in. What would your first move be if you were in this situation? 

In addition to funding my release plan, you would be helping me continue my Leather and Jewelry business. Pictured are some of the leather and jewelry items I make. My initial plan was to make and sell these products, using the profits to fund my release, getting a place to live, a vehicle, the basic necessities to start life again. Unfortunately, every person I have partnered with has either bailed out in mid-project, leaving hundreds of dollars in products and cash in limbo, and eventually I had to take the loss, or they have just outright burnt me for all my products and cash. To date, a loss of at least $5000. Shows that all criminals aren't in prison. This crowdfund will help buy much needed leather and jewelry supplies to keep production flowing. Also this will help compensate my business partner for her much appreciated, tireless help, guidance, and management skills. 

Meg Davis is my business partner. She has been instrumental in getting this crowdfund together for me, not to mention managing sales, orders for materials, researching and organizing other projects all while being a student. Add to that, Meg is the founder/director of the Stories Project (weekofactionmovement.wordpress.com). As a victim of anti-gay violence, not having a vehicle or forum to communicate her struggle motivated her to create the Stories Project to, at the very least, open the dialogue about problems that victims and their loved ones face after violence. This is a strong and brave young woman with her heart in the right place who is doing what is rare in society today: helping others deal with these serious problems. Some of this funding will go to paying her salary and continue the development and expansion of the Stories Project. 

We are also working on an eNewsletter called "The Prison Experience." This will chronicle my life in prison from arrest to the present, eventually transitioning to "The Freedom Experience." This will follow my experiences once I'm released. Seeing freedom from the eyes of a person isolated from society for 34+ years. Experiencing the internet, a smart phone, all of today's fascinating technologies for the 1st time and try a Starbucks latte for the 1st time. The Prison Experience will be a companion to my website, prisoncrafted.com, in which prison art and other handcrafted works can be purchased. This will include art work: paintings, pencil and pen drawings, beaded jewelry, ceramics, wood work, and other unique pieces. 

So I am not ePanhandling for free money. A limited amount of items will be available to supporters, as displayed. And know that you are supporting and helping get a person's life started on the right track. Please note you will be receiving a high quality handmade product. All my leather products are made with real leather and skins. The jewelry is made with the best Japanese and Czech beads, and all gemstones are real. All the other materials I use are of the best quality. Also know that you are part of a leather and jewelry line that will be an exclusive product in the near future. 

Why should you fund a convicted felon's release? Society looks down on ex-convicts, but the truth of the matter is, convicts get released back into society. The recidivism rate in the United States is somewhere around 67%, meaning that almost 7 out of 10 ex-convicts commit new crimes and return to prison. I do not want or plan to be one of those 7. I'm not a gang member, drug dealer, or street hustler. I grew up lower-middle class and did not have the proper guidance in my youth, which resulted in me making bad decisions in the beginning of adulthood. This is no excuse or justification. I committed a crime and have served the time. It's now my responsibility to get out and be a productive member of society. To accomplish this, I have taken the opportunity to educate myself and develop employable skills that I can put to immediate use upon release. I have an entrepreneurial mindset and business plans in development  that I would like to put into action. I have a drive to get out there and be successful, and try to help people out there struggling. However corny or trite it sounds, I want to take my success and pay it forward to help troubled youth before they end up in prison. So what you donate now will be an investment in not just making my life better, but also the people I can in turn help to make their lives better. 

If you have any questions or if you would like to know more about me or the Stories Project / the Week of Action Movement, contact us at: 

keryanderson17@gmail.com

www.facebook.com/kery.anderson

For more information about me, you can visit: www.prisoninmates.com/KeryAnderson279517 

www.prisonerassistant.com/client-profiles-featu...

story:
I am opening First Line Defense Houston LLC. an infantry veteran owned and operated training company with the goal of achieving two things. First, provide personalized IN-HOME tactical Self Defense Training, on-site home threat assessments, and many other tactical defense courses ensuring clients have the skills and confidence to protect themselves and their families against anyone that decides to make their home part of tomorrow's morning news. And second, to build a company that can offer a career option for Combat Veterans returning to civilian life. Specifically, i will be creating positions that require the skills these soldiers already possess. And more importantly, hire them at a pay that an adult can actually provide for a family on. 
The Goal is to reach $200,000.00 in funding. This will cover the following, 
♠ $20,000.00 per year (x2 years) into Marketing/Advertising building clients to the    point of providing 12 to 16 courses a week, consistently scheduled out two weeks.
♠ $9,000.00 over 3 years covering Continued training for myself and instructors,         ensuring we are providing the absolute best training possible for our clients,
♠ $15,000.00 one time cost on training equipment and company equipment                  to provide our clients with an amazing experience that will have them bragging to      everyone they know. (Thus driving business to us)
♠ $35,000.00 (x2) salary to myself and my partner, allowing my to leave my current    "day Job" and focus 100% of my time and energy on developing this company.           With this one year, I will turn this into a self reliant profitable business.
♠ $49,000.00 in the bank as working capitol to cover additional start up costs,              future employees, and expansion into new, wider markets.

With the threat of home invasions rising every day, the risk has simply become to great to brush off and "worry about it tomorrow". It is time to prepare for the what-ifs, its time to learn how to properly use the tools you have already, and we want you to learn from our combat veteran staff. They are dedicated to providing every client with the same knowledge, skills, and confidence that unarguably was responsible for their return from and Iraq and Afghanistan.
Course Breakdown:
♠ Private In-Home Tactical Self Defense:
• Threat assessment abilities and making the choice fight or hide.
• Family communication before, during and after a crisis.
• Deadly force vs debilitating/crippling options if you’re forced to defend your self or others.
• How to "stack-up" (if with your partner/roommate) or fundamentals of room clearance tactics and pieing corners training. Developing into clearing the house with proper strait line /button hook entry and corner to border sector clearance while moving room to room through the home.
• What to do when the threat has been neutralized.
• What to do with your family members if you must use deadly force.
♠ HOME THREAT ASSESSMENT:
• Full, on site home assessment: floor plans and 
• A complete survey of your home and surrounding exterior perimeter areas including current lights, locks, entry/exit points.
• Review family safety, security and evacuation plans.
• Review of physical security devices, including doors, windows, and safes as to determine where and hope to improve safety.
• Examination of common security vulnerabilities.
• Identify areas of risk by locating and inspecting vulnerabilities enabling us to provide a breakdown of weak points throughout current security. 
• Provide a breakdown of what is needed to bring current conditions to a comfortable level. Included with these recommendations (which could include lighting, camera, motion sensors, and more) you will receive a quote for the installation of 
these services and items.
♠ M-16/AR-15 Familiarization 
♠ General Rifle/Pistol/Carbine/Shotgun
♠ Advanced Rifle/Pistol/Carbine/Shotgun
If you cant donate any funds that is ok, you can still help me reach my goals! Please take the short time to share this campaign with your Family, your phone book,  your email contacts, Facebook friends and anyone else you can. Getting the word out to the people i cant reach on my own is the surest way to reaching my goal.
Thank you all.

story:
Everyone’s Kinky is a site dedicated to educating the curious and removing some of the mystery and fear that surrounds the “kinky” world.  

This site already exists at Everyone's Kinky but we need help to get it to it's full potential!

We aim to explain a number of fetishes in an objective and easy to understand way, to provide tips/pointers on how to act on your kinky desires, to compile a comprehensive list of interesting movies/books that encompass your particular kinks, and to objectively review kinky dating sites to help you figure out where you can start meeting other kinksters.

Sections:  

  • Fetishes:  Comprehensive, fetish-specific advice and safety guidelines, impartial, kinky dating site reviews, we will never get paid or allow influence on these reviews.  
  • Reviews:  Comprehensive list and reviews of main-stream films and literature seeking to raise awareness, exploration and information of the kinky lifestyle.  
  • Toys:  An educational and Q&A section covering and describing all varieties of toys and equipment involved in play.  
  • General features:  un-biased and spam-free content, never influenced by advertisers or sponsors.
  • Future plans for sites which will enable further research and interactions.

This is NOT a "porn site!"  Although the subject matter is risqué and adult-oriented, our site is not geared towards "adult entertainment."  

Milestones:

$5,000:  Minimum Project Goal - This is what we expect to cover the expenses of this site reaching it's minimum potential. 

$8,500:  Secret Project - The only clue we will give you is to think of that slutty librarian.  This is the amount needed to complete a very special project.

$20,000:  Super Secret Project - Think of that girl next door who has always hidden this side of herself but needs to find someone with whom she can explore.  This is the amount needed to continue to build our vision of an open and user-friendly resource for Everyone who is Kinky.

Please donate what you are able and help spread the word that Everyone's Kinky!
story_txt:
Everyone’s Kinky is a site dedicated to educating the curious and removing some of the mystery and fear that surrounds the “kinky” world.  


This site already exists at Everyone's Kinky but we need help to get it to it's full potential!
 We aim to explain a number of fetishes in an objective and easy to understand way, to provide tips/pointers on how to act on your kinky desires, to compile a comprehensive list of interesting movies/books that encompass your particular kinks, and to objectively review kinky dating sites to help you figure out where you can start meeting other kinksters.
 Sections:  
 Fetishes:  Comprehensive, fetish-specific advice and safety guidelines, impartial, kinky dating site reviews, we will never get paid or allow influence on these reviews.  
Reviews:  Comprehensive list and reviews of main-stream films and literature seeking to raise awareness, exploration and information of the kinky lifestyle.  
Toys:  An educational and Q&A section covering and describing all varieties of toys and equipment involved in play.  
General features:  un-biased and spam-free content, never influenced by advertisers or sponsors.
Future plans for sites which will enable further research and interactions.


This is NOT a "porn site!"  Although the subject matter is risqué and adult-oriented, our site is not geared towards "adult entertainment."  
Milestones:
$5,000:  Minimum Project Goal - This is what we expect to cover the expenses of this site reaching it's minimum potential. 
$8,500:  Secret Project - The only clue we will give you is to think of that slutty librarian.  This is the amount needed to complete a very special project.
$20,000:  Super Secret Project - Think of that girl next door who has always hidden this side of herself but needs to find someone with whom she can explore.  This is the amount needed to continue to build our vision of an open and user-friendly resource for Everyone who is Kinky.
Please donate what you are able and help spread the word that Everyone's Kinky!

story:
Short Summary

The Sweetness of Being started from my home kitchen in Venice, in January of 2014. Thank goodness for the Cottage Food act! Over the past year and a half, my sister Danielle and I have had time to perfect the recipes and develop many relationships with organic markets, juice shops, and restaurants who are all committed to bringing organic, sustainable, artisanal and locally produced food to Los Angeles and beyond. 

In the past six months, our sales have grown and I have had many requests from outside of California to carry The Sweetness of Being chocolate. 

It is really wonderful to have a chocolate bar to share, which is made with so many nutritious ingredients:

Raw wildflower honey from a solar powered honey farm in California.

Organically grown, single origin cacao from a family owned plantation in Mexico.

Organic mucuna pruriens from Sun Potion, an ayruvedic herb that helps to soothe and uplift the nervous system. It contains 15% levodopa, a dopamine precursor.

All the other ingredients are always organic.

Naturally gluten-free, soy-free and dairy-free.

100% biodegradable packaging.

What We Need & What You Get

It has come time for our expansion into a commercial kitchen! And we are thrilled.

I am so thankful to have the opportunity to play so many different roles within this business: marketing, recipe development, training, accounting, customer service, graphic design, billing, shipping, receiving, inventory, website design and expansion!

(A special thanks to Jon Marro for the logo and label design! AND co-facilitating the original idea for starting the business).

And now it is time to reach out and ask for support from the community in order to fulfill the financial impact of our move.

Biodegradable Shipping supplies

500 7x5x4 recycled shipping boxes $320

1000 biodegradable shipping bags for gel packs $100

5 cases of biodegradable gel packs $220

200 insulated shipping boxes 14x10x8 $1800

500 Display boxes (post consumer recycled paper) $1600

15 new moulds (from recycled materials) $320

Equipment

Chocolate tempering machine $2250

Chocolate dispenser $650

Commercial Kitchen rental

Rental deposit $1000

2 months rent ($20 per hour/160hrs) $3200

License

Food Registration Application $450

Indiegogo and credit card fees

Total cost $11,910

(plus $1,071 for Indiegogo and credit card fees for the campaign).

I have still yet to really take any income for myself from this project and that is why we are asking for help from the community.

The Impact

With your support, we will be able to bring our sustainable & wildcrafted chocolate bars to the whole country! 

Providing the community with a nutritious chocolate bar which supports both physical wellbeing as well as environmental stewardship in every aspect of the business. From how the cacao beans are grown, the solar power which is fed back to the grid through the honey farm, to the option of packaging and shipping which is able to disintegrate biologically unlike other companies which use petrochemical based, enviornmentally unsustainable materials. 

The Sweetness of Being is a socially just model of business in that every employee (my sister and future employees of course....) is guaranteed to make a living wage. Hopefully including myself in the near future.


10% of our profits will be annually donated to two of my favorite non-profit organizations. They are both doing wonderful things in the world. 

Inkarri US, the aim of Inkarri is to promote profound personal transformation through its holistic education program, the Pneuma System, which seeks to integrate the spiritual, psychological, and physical aspects of the individual.

Kiss the Ground, provides solutions to global climate change through the restoration of our precious soils.


Risks & Challenges

The market already has SO many amazing chocolate bars, so you might wonder why we have decided to add one more to the list. 

We sweeten our bars only with raw wildflower honey. Raw honey is an ancient sweetener which is renowned for its healing qualities. It contains trace minerals, vitamins and enzymes and never undergoes heavy processing. There are only a few other companies providing chocolate with this wholesome sweetener. 

Also at the forefront of our business model are the principles of environmental sustainability. We are a long way from living sustainably on this planet until we all make changes on a global scale. However, every little bit helps, and that is why I ensure that every decision supports companies and products with the highest standards in sustainability. 

That said, we are only one small bar in a sea of other chocolate. This is a big part of why we need your help.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on your social media, with friends or family if it inspires you to support a local small business with an environmentally responsible and socially just model.

story:
Short Summary

Hi again! I'm Jen and I own Retro Daddio--an awesome pop culture and music store in Williamsburg, VA. We ran an Indiegogo campaign that ended a month-ish ago and we raised about $2000 of the $25,000 that we were looking for, so we're running part two to try to get the rest of what we need.

I opened Retro Daddio in October 2013 after operating as an online store since the summer of 2010. At the time I started the online store, I was working a full-time-six-night-a-week job, a part-time-three-day-a-week job, finishing my degree, and I had a husband, two dogs, two cats, a mortgage...and no sleep. Or time with my husband. Or time for anything else. So we started the business with the idea that eventually we'd move into a brick and mortar location and be able to work together, bring our dogs to work, etc. Awesome plan, right? It was! Until one of the dogs died. And then Ralph went into the hospital having seizures and died six weeks later. Needless to say, I made no huge decisions for a year and waited a year and a half before deciding to sell the house, give away most of my stuff and start driving back to Virginia after eight years in Las Vegas to take the huge leap into retail-land. So my mom and pop shop became a mom and dog shop. And then my dog died of bone cancer(it was a rough couple years). So my mom and dog shop became a mom shop...

What We Need & What You Get

The store is doing well and sales are improving all the time, but I need a business loan to consolidate outstanding debt, get in a few new fixtures, bring in some new product lines including vintage-look/rockabilly clothing, more band tees, etc (we've already brought in the games and gaming supplies that we talked about in the last campaign and that are mentioned in the video!) I also work a variety of sci-fi conventions as a vendor and would like to get a used cargo van to haul my merchandise and fixtures in rather than having to worry about things getting ruined every time I go through a rainstorm or stolen if I pull into a rest area.

I've been working with my banker for over a year to get a Small Business Administration loan and have been told that they think I'm an excellent candidate, BUT I have to come up with $15,000 to put up against what they're willing to give me before I can get the disbursement.  We raised about $2,000 in the last campaign between online and in-store contributions, and I just found that they'll count my IRA toward that total as well, so we're actually almost halfway there!

We have a bunch of perks that you can receive in exchange for your support, so check those out and see if any of them appeal to you. Some of them are similar to the ones we offered in the previous campaign and some are totally new.

The Impact

The bottom line is that I'm doing...okay, but the loan will make things SO MUCH less stressful--and will eliminate the added stress of the off-season sales plummet that happens every winter. Oh! And I'd actually be able to take a small salary for the first time in two years! And maybe hire a part-time employee so I can take a day off once a week!

So that's what the loan will do for me/the store. Here's what the store does for Williamsburg;

We give a LOT in donations to local events, charities, causes, etc.--both financial donations and in-kind donations for door prizes, auctions, etc                             

We showcase the work of several local artists and give them a place to sell their work on consignment.

We provide a place for schools, churches, conventions, groups, the public library, and other small businesses to post flyers, posters, leave business cards for others to pick up, etc

We provide a space for gamers to gather and play board, card, and role playing games and for local groups to meet completely free of charge

We've hosted fundraisers for Heritage Humane Society and we're a pet friendly store, so no one has to leave their pet outside to come in and shop or hang out

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone wants to or CAN donate--I totally get that. We're also running other forms of fundraising, with all funds going to the same goal. Raffles through our Facebook page, a change jar on the counter, entering grant competitions, selling on eBay and Amazon, vending at as many conventions as I can afford space at--you name it, I'm trying it. I'm also working on a Kickstarter to pre-sell some cool t-shirts--that will be launching soon.

You can also help by just spreading the word, sharing the link to the campaign, and helping us raise our GoGoFactor. Everything helps get us visibility and it's all appreciated!

You can also send people into the shop at 218 Monticello Avenue, Williamsburg, VA 23185 or send them to our online store at https://www.shopretrodaddio.com so they can see our awesome offerings from Doctor Who, Star Trek, Star Wars, The Beatles, Monty Python, Harry Potter, and lots more, plus a wide selection of used cds and vinyl records.

story:
Welcome to The Beer Engine,

A Craft Beer Bar in the Heart of Sheffield specialising in quality products from both Bar & Kitchen.

My name is Thomas Harrington & I set up the Beer Engine in a quest to create an Oasis of excellence where people could enjoy quality products served by friendly staff in a clean & comfortable environment.

Staff are Key. Every single employee is paid at least the living wage (£7.85) with opportunities to earn more through incentives & promotions. They are also entitled to 28 days holiday per annum.

This decision was taken to combat the rise in 'zero-hour' contracts and to provide employees with a chance of making a decent enough living from a job that requires a high level of competency to be done well, in a sector that is grossly undervalued.

Although controlling staff costs is fundamental in creating a profitable business, poor staff performance can have much more of a negative impact. So much so, that the chances of a business succeeding (or failing) can hinge on the attitude & input of its Employees.

As we enter into the colder months I am looking for funding to restore the two coal fires in the pub so that they are fully functional by the time we hit winter.

I'm also looking to build a wooden structure in the beer garden, with heaters, to provide shelter for customers  who prefer their drinking alfresco.

Any funds raised will be used solely for the development of the pub & I will ensure that only local tradesmen are used to undertake the work.

story:
Do you have a food allergy? Maybe you're a coeliac, lactose intolerant or diabetic. We help people with food allergies find and share their favourite recipes with ease. 

Maybe you're just sick of feeling hungry but not knowing what to eat. 

Or 

You feel like you're cooking the same meal week in week out.

Tantalise your taste buds by finding, sharing and following original recipes from real people - just like you - online, all in one place! 

It's a brilliant way to create a dashboard of your favourite chef's meals, create a list of your favourite recipes, create weekly meal plans and engage in conversation with other food lovers! It saves you time, effort and money trying to find that perfect cook book. 
Why not join others in creating your own online? - Also monitor your cooking skills and learn more as you go. You can be an amateur, intermediate or professional cook and this app will continue to build your confidence in the kitchen.   

Coming from a Marketing and Sales background in tech, I know how difficult it is to start your own business and create an amazing app people want to use. To make it easy for you to find new exciting recipes and share your own with others; I'm looking for funding to help me create this fun, fantastic, foodie app. 

I'm a young, enthusiastic, food lover myself, who is sick of scrolling through pages and pages on unoriginal recipes on the web. So please help me fund this idea!

Later in the year I will pitch to large food companies who will want to promote their food produce through the app. As well as work with Nutritionists and Nurses/NHS. But I need help getting there :)

story:
First off, we cannot show pictures of actual foster children.  Therefore, I hope this picture of smiling, happy me will suffice to imbue you with the spirit of giving.   Secondly, all persons touching this project have extensive experience supporting foster children.

As a former foster child from New York City and a former county social worker here in Santa Clara (for going on 14 years), I might say I am extremely passionate about helping foster children have a better life.  Certainly, those folks who know me would say that.  After retirement I have signed on to assist a small foster family agency whose homes are critical to the efforts of Santa Clara and other counties to fill the dearth of licensed foster homes in the Bay Area.  While I would rather try to fund more projects like summer camps and trips for children in the future, as an advocate for our foster homes and foster parents also, I know it's first things first; safety and compliance with regulations, which say December 2015 is the date for having these detectors in all foster homes.  Please help me help this non-profit agency and these foster parents obtain this funding.  And I will tell you, as a former foster parent myself, every ounce of support from the government and/or the community helps assure that foster parents continue to feel cared about and their needs taken seriously and understood by the communities in which they live.  

What We Need & What You Get

Every $30.00 will enable us to purchase a detector with electric and battery components so it will not just die off suddenly.  These will be checked by authorized staff each month and every home will have one, with a few left over as spares for new homes coming into the system and replacements for failed or broken detectors.

  • Honestly, I don't think many people can get too "excited" about a smoke or CO2 detector.  What I believe is that the excitement is in visualizing the assistance you are giving as making a concrete difference, however ordinary it may seem.
  • Also, even if I do not reach my entire goal of $900.00, I will begin using the donations to fund as many homes as I can and then I would continue to lobby for support for these foster families.  I do not give up easily.  :)

The Impact

I can only say here that it will be my great pleasure to help install these detectors while explaining to the children and foster parents how many people stood up and gave, even a small amount, to ensure they were in compliance with the licensing laws and safe from that particular danger.

Risks & Challenges

I don't believe there are real risks involved in this project, with the exception that it is unknown if enough folks will care about it to help it succeed.  That is a risk, to even try.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute funding for this project, I would just ask that you put it on your FB page for others to see and maybe that way, the effort can continue.

story:
Campaign & Magnitude of the contribution

There is momentum throughout the country to make the Lebanese community more walking, commuting by public transport and cycling-friendly, thereby making them more viable. But, the actual state composition, strategies, and priorities won’t be helpful in achieving such objectives on small nor large scale, leaving Byblos, the oldest inhabited city in the world, to face a rapid development without evaluating its exposures to risks on social, economical and environmental levels. 


ODDD ngo took this challenge and led the way by showing an example on how to change the people (citizens and tourists) behavior and upgrade the city’s transportation strategies to meet up with sustainable models.

After a full year of studies, researches, analysis, questionnaires, measurements and simulations, an international lab inviting 8 different cities, from 5 different continents,  will be held in Byblos, on October 22nd-24th 2015, to share the specialists’ knowledge and help in developing the Byblos sustainable public transportation strategy.  As well, we will be executing examples of the sustainable urban public transportation fixtures designed by the local community

ODDD FB page campaign event


Your contribution will help us in achieving 4 main tasks:

1-  Execute a sustainable bus shelter designed by youth participants through a competition ($4000)

2-  Trips and accommodations for the Lab guests from : Boston (USA), Curitiba (BRA), Sousse (TUN), Amman (JOR), Nicosia (CYP), Masdar city (UAE), Byblos (LEB) and Avignon (FRA) ($4500)

3-  The first inner Byblos city bus lane activation  for three days during the Lab, to facilitate people and attendees commuting to the workshop ($2500)

4-  Execute the sustainable designed road & parking signs for Byblos city which is deeply in need of. (like the transformation of the Liban cable wooden wheel into parking and entrances signs) ($2000)


The Impact


One of the campaign main goal is simply to upgrade Byblos city inhabitants lifestyle into a sustainable one, which will lead to a worldwide contribution in fighting climate change, thus a development towards the usage of clean, renewable energy, breathing pollution-free air, increasing human been comfort socially, thermally and economically and finally protecting the environment. Second, bringing large experimented developed cities on board with small scale cities from developing countries is a way to exchange knowledge, culture, technology and experience and join forces to make this world a better sustainable one.

Such project, might have a direct impact on the oldest inhabited city in the world, but also, its international dimension make the impact on a worldwide level, thus your contribution will make difference on local, regional and international level.

story:
Valkoinen Puu

Greetings from Mark and Kirsi Heidt!

Owners and creators of Valkoinen Puu!


Sit back and relax and let us share our amazing story with you... because our business is more than just a coffee house. It's an inspiring creation to awaken your every senses through experiencing delicious quality desserts, superior coffees, fresh foods, all in a mood filled setting that once you settle in... you won't want to leave.  Welcome to Valkoinen Puu!


Who We Are 

We are Mark(American)  and Kirsi(Finnish) and our careers involved us working in the interior and ceramic design fields. We moved from the US to Finland in 2007 as our ceramics were selling so well here. We specifically came to open a coffee house that would combine our ceramics and our passion for creating delicious foods, desserts and coffees in an unforgettable cozy setting. 
Our inspiration to create an unforgettable coffee house was this simple thought. If we were traveling anywhere in the world, what type of coffee house would we want to stumble upon? We would want to enter a place that is beautiful, that we would experience with all of our senses. A place that would be cozy with warm customer service. The foods delicious and the desserts and coffees made with love and care. A place where time isn't a thought and new memories are being made. An experience that continues to intensify the longer you stay. When it is time to go you are completely satisfied and leave with a sigh and a thought  of "Wow! that was great!"


Some of our Desserts- Fresh, home made from scratch, with the finest ingredients

  

  

  


Our greatest advertising is our customers sharing their experiences after visiting our coffee house. One amazing opportunity that was presented to us was when a customer saw an ad on TV for submissions to be on  "Finland's Top Bakery Show". The customer sent an email to the producers and the next thing you know Valkoinen Puu is competing on Season 1 of the show. Amazing!! 

Our passion and experience to create such a coffee house finally arrived in June 2011 when Valkoinen Puu (The White Tree) opened its doors in the small town of Kauhajoki Finland. 
We have been humbly amazed and thankful by the out pouring support from our customers locally and those that travel many hours to experience Valkoinen Puu. We thank you sincerely and we will keep working hard to bring you a wonderful  coffee house experience.
Warmest regards,
Mark, Kirsi and the Valkoinen Puu team!

* "The World's Best Coffee House" is quoted from many of our customers




Our Campaign

Our company is a small business. A husband and wife team creating delicious cakes and foods for our coffee house. We also design and make our own ceramic collection lines.
Some of our Ceramics- Hand made, hand painted, food, oven & dishwasher safe

    

  


Our campaign goal of 50,000 dollars is to be used to purchase the necessary equipment, furniture and supplies to open a second cafe in a much larger neighboring town of Seinäjoki, Finland. The justification for another cafe is simple, our customers demands. We have been asked to open cafes in multiple cities throughout Finland, Helsinki being the biggest. A second cafe brings us the greatest monetary return for our business for reinvestment. 


Some of our Foods- Freshly made and prepared to order

 

 


Our impact in the global community

-We are creating jobs  
-A special place for business meetings in the community.
-An inspired space for artisans to perform music, theater, and showcase their art.
- Working with schools, offering work experience for students from 1-6 weeks.
-We buy locally, support locally. We use local ingredients such as organic spelt, eggs, goat cheese, berries and bread to name a few.
-We want to inspire students and any potential entrepreneur to pursue their passion, thus we enjoy speaking at schools and business conferences when the opportunity presents itself.
-Offering services to businesses such as luncheons and business gifts.
 -Creating beautiful and multi-functional interior ceramics for sale for the home. Of course you can buy from anywhere in the world. Food safe, dishwasher safe and oven safe!


Creating quality products certainly pays off!

We care and choose to use real and fresh ingredients in our foods and desserts. This choice constantly opens new opportunities for us in our business, such as press and magazine articles, tv and requests for our presence at large music festivals throughout the country. 
We have all heard the saying "Keeping it real"  When you do,  good things will come.

Our Baking Ingredients

We use only organic spelt flour for any recipe calling for flour. This includes desserts and our home made quiche bases. We use rose salt in everything needing salt. Rose salt is not processed like regular white salt. It is rose colored and contains the healthy minerals through it's longer processing process. We use indian sugar in some of our desserts, cookies and American pancakes. It too retains the healthy minerals via its processing process.

 

 

Our Challenges

Our greatest challenge is keeping up with the demand for our cakes and other bake good products. We would really need a separate bakery. We are juggling baking and food preparation in the same space through out the day. This creates the problem that we just can't fill all the necessary baked good products for our shelves daily. Opening a second coffee house will solve this problem. We will be able to generate a much larger revenue by being in a bigger city, thus we can reinvest into a bakery.

If we don't reach our campaign goal, we will use what funds are raised to help with the amount to open our second cafe.


Our Perks

We are very excited to be offering really cool and collectible perks!

Here are a few for the offering!!!
You can own a copy from an original artwork drawing featuring Valkoinen Puu. Drawn by our friend, Story Board Artist John Achenbach from THE SIMPSONS. This will only be available during our campaign.


Or... you can own a copy of a design rendering sketch from Valkoinen Puu. These are sketches from our Home Ceramic Line drawn and designed by Mark & Kirsi Heidt. There are only a Limited Edition of 300 prints signed and numbered. This will only be available during our campaign


You may also like... an Official Finnish Postal Stamp of our coffee house Valkoinen Puu plus a Valkoinen Puu sticker.


Or... some Beautiful and Multi-Functional Sushi Dishes by Valkoinen Puu hand made and hand painted. 

 


Or...Valkoinen Puu hand made Porcelain  Ornaments

 


Or... A Valkoinen Puu Ceramic Package,  hand made and hand painted.

 


Or... *A VIP Special Evening at the new Seinäjoki Valkoinen Puu, (Finland Only) featuring recording artists Irina and Antti Kleemola. This is a VIP private party before our grand opening. Limited 200 guests. Enjoy foods, desserts, coffees and a special gift plus our exciting entertainment. 

Spring 2016 -Time and Date to Be determined 

*If our campaign goal is not met, then this Perk will be 4 sushi dishes (color of your choice) 

         


Or... A Pack of 20 Gift Cards valued at 10€ each (Finland Only)


Or... Dinner for 25 guests at Valkoinen Puu in Kauhajoki. (Finland Only) Experience Valkoinen Puu with family, friends or colleagues in a buffet style. Fresh foods, salads, coffees and desserts, plus a special gift from us to you.


Featured Publications

  

                                                 

Our Thanks and Gratitude...

By contributing to our campaign, you will help us do all the things we want to do, locally and globally. We personally want to Thank You for helping us by purchasing one of our perks. If a perk doesn't interest you, maybe our commitment to the ethics of how we run our business will. If so, please share our campaign with your family and friends. 

Warmest regards,

Mark and Kirsi Heidt

story:
$5 Alumni Challenge

The HOBY Georgia corporate board and seminar planning committee challenge 1,000 HOBY alumni (and friends!) to each give $5 to raise $5,000 (in 30 DAYS!!!) for the 2016 seminars!  The HOBY alumni year that donates the most will win the inaugural HOBY Cup!  (It’s going to be cool, trust us.)

We want to know what you will give up to give $5 to HOBY, so post a video on facebook, photo on Instagram, or tweet us and use the hashtag #5forHOBY!

What is HOBY?

Hugh O’Brian Youth Leadership (HOBY) is a non-profit organization that was started in 1958 by celebrity actor, Hugh O’Brian.  The mission of HOBY is to inspire and develop our global community of youth and volunteers to a life dedicated to leadership, service and innovation.  The vision of HOBY is to motivate and empower individuals to make a positive difference within our global society, through understanding and action, based on effective and compassionate leadership.

HOBY Georgia is run by all volunteers who give countless hours throughout the year to provide life-changing experiences for several hundred high school sophomores from all over the state every spring in two seminars: GA Northwest and GA Southeast.

Learn more about HOBY Georgia at www.gahoby.org.

You can help us make a difference!

It takes over $50,000 to run our two HOBY Georgia seminars each year, and we are putting forth a large fundraising effort this year to ensure HOBY Georgia is sustainable in the future.  Our goal with the $5 Alumni Challenge is to raise $5,000 for the 2016 seminars, and to start a culture of alumni giving back to the organization they love.  We hope you'll contribute!

Other ways to get involved

If you can't contribute financially at this time, you can still help us out!  We would love for you to help spread the word about the $5 Alumni Challenge and make some noise about our campaign on social media!

Also, consider becoming a volunteer for one of the HOBY Georgia 2016 seminars at GA Northwest (Berry College) or GA Southeast (Georgia College)!  To become a volunteer, sign up at www.hoby.org/volunteer/volunteer-for-leadership....

story:
The Goal

We are witnessing a refugee crisis that is Europe's biggest since World War II. Almost 4 million people have fled Syria since the start of the conflict, most of them women and children. It is one of the largest refugee exoduses in history. But this is not just Europe's responsibility. 

Anyone who has the ability to help is responsible and cannot remain apathetic. 

These are people with lives and families and careers who are facing a choice that none of us can imagine. Putting their children on boats, acting out of desperation, all with the goal of getting somewhere safe. Anywhere safe. Their country has been ravaged by a war that has been going on so long that many Syrian children don't know any different. Poverty, fear, starvation and violence is all that they have ever known.

If you are like me, you are reading about families suffocating on trucks, and drowned toddlers washing up on beaches and you're feeling heartbroken and helpless. 

I, like so many others that I know, want to do something. But it is expensive to get a family relocated here to Toronto, and on their feet. 

The minimum cost to help relocate a family of 4 through Lifeline Syria* is $27,000. 

When I saw that number I was disheartened. I don't know anyone who has that much money to donate in a lump sum. But I can contribute some money and I know a lot of others who are willing to do the same. If we come together collectively, we can make it happen. We can change a family's entire life and path, as well as the path of their children. 


What We Need & What You Get


Lifeline Syria recommends that groups come together to sponsor a family. Partly because, finances aside, the family will need other kinds of support. Time is a big one. The family will need orientation and emotional support, they will need assistance with finding employment, navigating transportation systems, making health connections and registering for school.

This crowd-funding site is one small way to contribute to us reaching this goal and helping a family directly by getting them here to Toronto. This campaign will run alongside fundraising events to help us further reach our goal.


The Impact


It goes without saying that the direct impact to improve valuable lives is immeasurable. And it will be the result of a grassroots movement, which is a beautiful thing. 


Risks & Challenges

I will be completely transparent about the fact that I'm scared to take this on. This is a huge target. It will take a lot people and time and contributions to reach this goal. But I'm an optimist and I refuse to be daunted by the number. This is not an impossible goal.

All of that said, if we can't achieve the target number, all of the funds raised will be donated to Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) International, or Doctors Without Borders which is a known NGO, making progress at helping people on the ground.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money, consider donating time fundraising with us or items or services to be auctioned. No contribution is too small. Even just sharing the link via social media helps us further this cause. 

*Lifeline Syria is an organization that will recruit, train and assist sponsor groups to welcome and support 1,000 Syrian refugees coming to Canada as permanent immigrants to resettle in the GTA over the next two years. Recent coverage: http://www.thestar.com/news/immigration/2015/09...
